entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening and ending near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear in the evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
